verses.name: Proverbs 21:1
verses.text: The king’s heart is in the hand of the Lord, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.

verses.name: Proverbs 21:2
verses.text: Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the Lord pondereth the hearts.

verses.name: Proverbs 21:3
verses.text: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the Lord than sacrifice.

verses.name: Proverbs 21:4
verses.text: An high look, and a proud heart, and the plowing of the wicked, is sin.

verses.name: Proverbs 21:5
verses.text: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.
